text: Veloropsis rufoflava is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae, and the only species in the genus Veloropsis. It was described by Breuning in 1969.Biolib.cz - Veloropsis rufoflava. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Desmiphorini Category:Beetles described in 1969
title: Veloropsis rufoflava
